long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sonar's Salesforce and Pardot explorer extension: Great for navigating your Salesforce and Pardot metadata with Sonar constantly by your side. Sonar imports, parses, and visualizes the downstream impacts of changes to the configuration of your Salesforce and Pardot instances. The Sonar chrome extension enables Sales Operations and Marketing Operations professionals to work together in one application. Never make a breaking change again!
